name: Cube Love
description:
The goal of the game is to join Cubes together.

Only left mouse click or touch needed.

I know it's missing music, that graphics need improvement, and that it's short. Feedback on the gameplay itself would be much appreciated. Thanks!

Made in less than 48 hours for Brackeys Game Jam #2 for which the theme was Love is blind. Made in Unity 2018.3.6f1. Used Piskel 0.14.0 for art and Bfxr 1.4.1 for sound effects.
